title: Honolulu Zoo
seo_description: A beer dinner is brewing on the beach! Take a seat at JRDN on March 3rd as we join forces with Saint Archer Brewing for a perfectly paired 4 course meal for only $55 per person. Space at the table is limited, snag your ticket today!
Price: $14 Adults; $6 Children (3-12 yrs); Discounts for kamaaina and military

contents_1: Located in Waikiki is an unexpected 42 acres of land that is home to 905 animals and numerous native and non-native plant species.
description: Located in Waikiki is an unexpected 42 acres of land that is home to 905 animals and numerous native and non-native plant species. A trip to the zoo is perfect for families and animal lovers who want to experience wildlife in Hawaii.
